data.name: Stop the Blight
data.detailed_description:
You are a wizard from the citadel of magic, purging armies of the undead in a never ending fight across the multiverse, to stop the blight.



Defend against legions of undead in a desperate last stand until the relic can fully charge. Build towers, barricades, and traps to defeat enemies as each wave increases in intensity.



Raise or lower the terrain to create mazes, gain better line of sight for your towers, and funnel enemies into kill zones. But beware, enemies can change the terrain also and will try to create breaches in your walls.



During each game you will be able to choose random upgrades. These upgrades will let you build new towers or upgrade existing towers giving them better damage, range or new abilities.



Each mission is randomly generated with different terrain, resources, and enemies. Adjust to the ever shifting terrain, and take the high ground!



Unlock permanent upgrades which will persist through every game you play giving you a small boost to the start of your next game.
data.about_the_game:
You are a wizard from the citadel of magic, purging armies of the undead in a never ending fight across the multiverse, to stop the blight.



Defend against legions of undead in a desperate last stand until the relic can fully charge. Build towers, barricades, and traps to defeat enemies as each wave increases in intensity.



Raise or lower the terrain to create mazes, gain better line of sight for your towers, and funnel enemies into kill zones. But beware, enemies can change the terrain also and will try to create breaches in your walls.



During each game you will be able to choose random upgrades. These upgrades will let you build new towers or upgrade existing towers giving them better damage, range or new abilities.



Each mission is randomly generated with different terrain, resources, and enemies. Adjust to the ever shifting terrain, and take the high ground!



Unlock permanent upgrades which will persist through every game you play giving you a small boost to the start of your next game.
data.short_description: Stop the Blight is a tower defense game with roguelite elements and destructible voxel terrain. Build your defenses, fight swarms of enemies, and learn powerful spells as you discover the origins of the Blight.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Dual Core 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
